resources.string: By clicking "Got it", you agree to the Terms of Use and acknowledge that you have read the information above
An app for tracking your weight. Log one measurement per day, then see how your weight changes over time
The application is created solely for self-monitoring of weight. For medical advice and treatment plans, please consult a doctor
We store all data locally on your device. We do not have access to your personal information, and the application does not send it to external servers
In the next step, you can set a passcode. Only you will see your data, even if your phone falls into the wrong hands
When you delete the application, all data will be permanently erased as we do not store it in the cloud. Please keep this in mind when clearing your phone
Select a preferred language for the interface. You can always change it later in settings
